etymology.description: 網(網) (wǎng, "net") + 易(易) (yì, "easy; exchange") form the name of the Chinese internet technology company NetEase. The name suggests the company's foundational focus on internet technology and the concept of facilitating interactions or exchanges online.
etymology.interpretation: The combination of 網(網) (wǎng, "net"), referring to the internet, and 易(易) (yì, "easy"), implies a focus on simplifying and facilitating online interactions, aligning with NetEase's core business in internet services.
etymology.simplification: 網易 is simplified to 网易.

examples.chinese: 网易是一家知名的互联网公司(網易是一家知名的互聯網公司)。
examples.pinyin: Wǎng Yì shì yī jiā zhīmíng de hùliánwǎng gōngsī.
examples.english: NetEase is a well-known internet company.

examples.chinese: 我常使用网易邮箱(我常使用網易郵箱)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ cháng shǐyòng Wǎng Yì yóuxiāng.

examples.chinese: 网易产品不断更新(網易產品不斷更新)，满足用户需求(滿足用戶需求)。
examples.pinyin: Wǎng Yì chǎnpǐn bùduàn gēngxīn, mǎnzú yònghù xūqiú.
examples.english: NetEase's products are continuously updated, meeting the needs of users.
